item.description:
I will be keep my SUV in my drive way on the
Third of July when the Fireworks are happening.

This means that I am not picking anyone up.

I am not car pooling with anyone.

Arraign for your own car pooling but
I will not be involved with it.

I recommend that you either take Campbell
Avenue to Blohm Street, turn onto
Blohm Street where Campbell Motors is.
Take this to Morse Avenue.

Or take Elm Street to Second Avenue.
Turn away from the Kraisers Shopping Center.
Turn Right on Blohm Street. Turn Left on
Morse Avenue.

Park near Morse Park. Walk over to
Chicks Drive Inn at the other end of the park.

If members want, they can go to Chicks.
There is probably parking next to Morse Park
Next to Chicks. I can walk over to Chicks. We can watch the Firework from
Either in front of Chicks or a few blocks closer to the
Right facing the water.

You should bring at least a flash light, blanket, maybe a lounge chair
and if you have one a portable
Radio to hear which every radio station is paying
Music with the Fireworks.


http://www.wfsb.com/f...

www.wfsb.com/fourthofjuly/13573002/detail.html

West Haven: Bradley Point. 9:30 p.m.

http://activerain.com...

activerain.com/blogsview/566615/Branford-East-Haven-Savin

I would say that we need to meet at Chicks by 8:15 to
8:30 to get settled for the West Haven Fireworks.

If no members come, then I will just stay home.
It is easier for me to watch the New Haven
Fire Works than the West Haven Fireworkd.
item.how_to_find_us: Members can go to Chicks. I can walk over if any members are there.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: West Haven Fire Works on July 3
